bdglue2.publisher.nosql

Class NoSQLKVHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdglue2.publisher.nosql.NoSQLHelper
      • bdglue2.publisher.nosql.NoSQLKVHelper

  • public class NoSQLKVHelper
extends NoSQLHelper
    A helper class that contains shared functionality for the NoSQL KV API for Flulme and direct connections.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class bdglue2.publisher.nosql.NoSQLHelper

      • getKey

        protected oracle.kv.Key getKey(String rowKeyStr)
        Convert the String representation of the key into a proper instance of a NoSQL Key.

        Returns:
        The NoSQL Key

      • getValue

        protected oracle.kv.Value getValue(String tableName,
                                   byte[] avroBody)
        Store the body of the event as the value of the key. The assumption is that the event body will already be serialized as an Avro record or in another suitable format.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table
        avroBody - the encoded event body
        Returns:
        the body of the event as a Value object.
